incompatible_libraries.streamlit: Web framework - use kivy for mobile UI
incompatible_libraries.flask: Web server - not needed on mobile
incompatible_libraries.django: Web framework - use kivy for mobile
incompatible_libraries.fastapi: Web API framework - not for mobile apps
incompatible_libraries.psycopg2: PostgreSQL driver - use sqlite3 for mobile
incompatible_libraries.psycopg2-binary: PostgreSQL driver - use sqlite3 for mobile
incompatible_libraries.mysql-connector-python: MySQL driver - use sqlite3 for mobile
incompatible_libraries.pymongo: MongoDB driver - use sqlite3 for mobile
incompatible_libraries.tkinter: Desktop GUI - use kivy for mobile
incompatible_libraries.pyqt5: Desktop GUI - use kivy for mobile
incompatible_libraries.pyqt6: Desktop GUI - use kivy for mobile
incompatible_libraries.wxpython: Desktop GUI - use kivy for mobile
incompatible_libraries.wmi: Windows management - not available on Android
incompatible_libraries.tensorflow: Heavy ML library - use tensorflow-lite for mobile
incompatible_libraries.pytorch: Heavy ML library - use pytorch-mobile for mobile
incompatible_libraries.scikit-learn: ML library with C deps - use lightweight alternatives
incompatible_libraries.pytest: Testing framework - not needed in production APK
incompatible_libraries.black: Code formatter - not needed in production APK
incompatible_libraries.flake8: Linter - not needed in production APK
